headline: Money Concepts Capital Corp. WIN Portfolios obtains Global Investment Performance Standards (GIPS) compliant via Broadridge
summary: Leveraging Broadridge Wealth Aggregation and Insights Money Concepts and its WIN Portfolios are able to implement firm-wide policies and procedures to produce GIPS compliant performance presentations.Palm Beach Gardens, FL, Sept. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Money Concepts Capital Corp. has verified thru an independent third-party the accuracy of its performance calculations, timeliness of inclusion/exclusion of accounts, appropriateness of benchmarks, completeness of disclosures, and internal c
